evidence.claim: SecureNetMD utilizes AWS cloud services to support its infrastructure.
Implementation of FHIR standards for data exchange is part of SecureNetMD's offerings.
SecureNetMD complies with HIPAA regulations for security and data privacy.
The company employs integration of EDI X12 transactions for healthcare data interchange.

icp.icp_reason: Supports EDI X12 transactions, indicating potential for API-first approach in health data exchange.
